title: There Were Times When I Wished You Were Dead - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Childhood Promise   Cruel Characters   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Empires   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Loneliness   Loner Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Quiet Characters   Royalty   Slow Romance   Tragic Past   Weak Protagonist
author: Jin Seo   진서
description:
The Emperor of Croisen hated Empress Yvonne. Enough that he'd wish for her to disappear three times a day.

I don't like the face of someone who looks just like the Duke of Delois, my enemy, but no matter how much I insulted her, her indifferent and aloof character stayed the same, which made me feel even more terrible.

I didn't care whether or not she disappears or dies. I was fine with anything as long as I didn't see her face.

The wish came true.

When he no longer wished for it to happen.>
